text: Tame kahi do ke he kitabavala'o! Tame kharekhara ko'i vastu para nathi jyam sudhi ke taurata ane injilane ane je kami tamari tarapha tamara palanahare avatarita karyu che, tenum anusarana na karo, je kami tamari tarapha tamara palanahara taraphathi avatarita karavamam avyum che, te te'o manthi vadhare padata lokona atyacara ane inkaramam vadharo kari dese, to tame te inkara karanara'o mate nirasa na thaso
